skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I'm a front-end developer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, focused on crafting responsive and intuitive interfaces that perform seamlessly across devices.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a back-end developer, I specialize in Node.js, Express, and database management, building secure, scalable server solutions that power complex applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: My approach to UI & UX design centers on creating user-centric and visually appealing interfaces, with a commitment to iterating based on user feedback for optimal usability.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Educated at UC Berkeley Extension and Saddleback College, I'm a web developer who thrives on solving technical challenges with innovative solutions, continuously learning to stay at the forefront of web technology.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce
portfolio.description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring user authentication, product search and filtering, and payment processing.

portfolio.title: Social Media
portfolio.description: A full-stack social media application built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring user authentication, post creation and interaction, and real-time notifications.

portfolio.title: E-Learning
portfolio.description: A full-stack e-learning application built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring user authentication, course creation and enrollment, and progress tracking.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A full-stack portfolio application built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring user authentication, project creation and management, and contact form submission.
